JUDGES: Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Volodymyr Butkevych;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON , from ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

In DATE the applicant ’s parents sold their real estates to a certain P. The sale contract is , according to the applicant , invalid , because the ORG allegedly did not consent to this transaction , ORG did not occupy the estates and did not pay the purchase price . Since the applicant ’s parents did not seem to be willing to re - occupy the property , this fell into ORG ownership .
I. Proceedings on the nullity of the sale contract ( no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL )
On DATE the applicant filed an action against ORG and GPE seeking to declare the sale contract null and void .
On DATE ORG ( okresní soud ) discontinued the proceedings following the applicant ’s withdrawal of her action . The court ’s decision became final on DATE .
II . Proceedings on the nullity of the sale contract ( no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL )
On DATE the applicant filed an action against GPE , GPE and GPE seeking to declare the sale contract null and void .
On DATE ORG discontinued the proceedings following the applicant ’s withdrawal of her action . The court ’s decision became final on DATE .
III . Proceedings on the determination of property rights ( no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL )
On DATE the applicant brought proceedings against GPE seeking to determine her property rights to the real estates which had belonged to her parents .
On DATE ORG discontinued the proceedings upon the applicant ’s withdrawal of her case . The decision became final on DATE .
IV . Proceedings on the determination of property rights ( no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL )
On DATE the applicant brought new proceedings seeking to determine her property rights to the real estates , this time against GPE and GPE .
On DATE ORG discontinued the proceedings upon the applicant ’s withdrawal of her case . The decision became final on DATE .
ORG proceedings
On DATE the applicant brought a number of actions for recovery of the property .
On DATE ORG decided to deal with the actions separately .
i ) Restitution proceedings no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL
On DATE the applicant withdrew her restitution action brought against GPE The proceedings were discontinued on DATE . ORG decision delivered in this respect became final on DATE .
ii ) Restitution proceedings no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL
The applicant ’s action brought against ORG ( ORG sdružení ORG ) was originally sent as a supplement to her action registered under no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL ( see above ) .
On DATE the proceedings were severed for separate consideration and decision .
The proceedings terminated in a decision of LOC ( krajský soud ) of DATE which became final on DATE .
iii ) Restitution proceedings no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL
The applicant ’s action brought against GPE ( ORG ) was originally sent as a supplement to her action registered under no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL ( see above ) .
The proceedings were severed and terminated on DATE .
iv ) Restitution proceedings no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL
The applicant ’s action brought against the Liberec Land Funds ( Pozemkový fond ) was originally sent as a supplement to her action registered under no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL ( see above ) .
The proceedings were severed and terminated in a decision of ORG ( PERSON ) of DATE .
v ) Restitution proceedings no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL
The applicant ’s action brought against ORG ( PERSON republiky ) was originally sent as a supplement to her action registered under no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL ( see above ) .
The proceedings were severed and terminated in a decision of ORG of DATE which became final on DATE .
vi ) Restitution proceedings no . CARDINAL Ca CARDINAL/CARDINAL

On DATE ORG ( pozemkový úřad ) rejected the applicant ’s claim for restitution of her GPE property . In a judgment of CARDINAL DATE ORG upheld the administrative decision . The judgment became final on DATE .
On DATE the applicant filed a constitutional appeal ( ústavní stížnost ) which ORG rejected as having been introduced outside the CARDINAL - days’ statutory time - limit on DATE .
VI . Proceedings on the determination of the applicant ’s inheritance ( no . CARDINAL C CARDINAL/CARDINAL )
On DATE the applicant filed an action against GPE to establish that the latter ’s property should be included in the applicant ’s inheritance .
The proceedings were discontinued on DATE , the applicant having not complied with ORG request to rectify certain shortcomings in her action . The decision became final on DATE .

The relevant domestic law and practice concerning remedies for the length of judicial proceedings are stated in the ORG ’s decision in the case of PERSON v. GPE , no . MONEY ( dec . ) , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL , DATE ) .
